# last-char [![Donate now][donate-now]][paypal-donations]

Get the last character in a provided string.

## Installation

```sh
$ npm i last-char
```

## Example

```js
// Dependencies
var LastChar = require("last-char");

console.log(LastChar("foo"));
// => "o"

console.log(LastChar("bar"));
// => "r"

```

## Press Highlights
None yet. If you wrote or found an article about this project, [add it][contributing] in this section.  :memo:

## Documentation

### `LastChar(input)`
Returns the last character of the provided string.

#### Params
- **String** `input`: The input string.

#### Return
- **String** The last character of the provided string.
